description: Detects a privilege elevation attempt by coercing NTLM authentication on the Printer Spooler service
author: Elastic (idea)
Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious NTLM Authentication on the Printer Spooler Service
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\rundll32.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"RUNDLL32.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:*C\:\\windows\\system32\\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie* AND process.command_line.text:*http* AND process.command_line.text:(*spoolss* OR *srvsvc* OR *\/print\/pipe\/*)))
